item.title: Passenger Notice System (No Smoking/fasten Seat Belt/Return to Cabin) Signs Flight Deck Automatic Function

remarks.para: Automatic function may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Manual Control function is operative, and
Procedures for its use are established and used.
The flight crew will ensure that all persons in the upper deck are notified when seat belts should be fastened.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "FLT DK AUTO FUNCTION INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
